replies.replyComment: Gedara gani hadala dena the eka bila othala dena bath ekath aran wedata ena miniha gedarin pita inna paya 8 kala simawe ara aurudu ganak ekata jeewath wena ganiwa maruna kiyanawa loke ganu ekka ekko e ahinsaka gani wena minihek ekka giya kiyanawa ekita karanna puluwan tharam ninda karanawa kalakanni eth ithin ane ara gani me kisi deyak danne gedara ganige unata panadol dekak aran dennathi thirisana loke ganunge niruwatha balanna phone eken unta deta kad danawa pirimi witharak newe ganuth innawa me wage me samaje maha pilikulak adare kiyanne uthum hagimak ege le naharak pasa denena deyak merena thurawata hadawath dekak ekata badila yanna ona gamanak eth dan inna un hadawatha kali kadala wikunana wendesi idamak karan sansarema epa wenawa me wena dewal ekka
